name: Spores
description:
Eat other "Spores" to grow in size and don't get eaten by Poisonous Spores.

- Eat Green Spores to increase in size and gain Points
- Get hit 5 times by Poisonous Spores to end your run.

Play 6 different Gamemodes and get Highscores in any of them.

There are 3 different Upgrades available.
